posts.post_content:
Five wonderful little pieces of baseball history, yes they are mostly in poor condition but that is the beauty of it, they are affordable! All five, yes all five! can be yours, delivered to your front door for the low low price of $85!!!! That's just $17 a card!!!!! You can own this little piece of history for just $17 dollars a card!!!!!!!!!! 
Buy them as Christmas, birthday or graduation gifts! Hand them out at your baseball themed party, what a hit you will be to all your friends!!!! 

If you would like to own these little cardboard treasures, hit me with a quick email at [url]Mountaineer1999@gmail.com[/url] or heck, just say so right here in this thread and they are yours!!!  Supplies are limited so act now!
